articles.headline: Tracking military justice
articles.summary: Reporters found that soldiers convicted of serious crimes were still receiving salaries while in prison, revealing faulty military data handling and sparking congressional reform.

articles.headline: Getting Access for stories
articles.summary: The article compares Microsoft Access with other database management systems for reporting, highlighting its user-friendly query interface and use in investigative journalism.

articles.headline: Being inventive
articles.summary: Explores the availability and use of the U.S. Patent Office database for discovering local patents, revealing inventors and designs with an emphasis on ease of access.

articles.headline: Look who gets City Hall jobs
articles.summary: Analyzes city government employment data to uncover trends and disparities in gender and ethnic representation among city employees.

articles.headline: Mapping branches
articles.summary: A study of banking behavior in New Jersey focused on the distribution of bank branches, revealing disparities in minority access to banking services.
